content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for expressing interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let's begin discussing the rental price to find a suitable agreement for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my situation. After carefully considering all aspects, I believe the proposed price for this apartment is somewhat steep for my budget as a student. I am open to discussing a more affordable option, given my responsible nature and commitment to maintaining the apartment well.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While I understand your circumstances as a student, my priority remains achieving the highest possible rental price for the property. However, I am willing to consider a slight adjustment to meet your needs. Please propose a revised figure that better aligns with your budget, keeping in mind our initial price expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my limited means as a student, while still maintaining a responsible approach to renting, I would suggest reducing the price by approximately 15% from the initial asking amount. This adjustment would make the rental more accessible for me and ensure I can maintain the apartment in good condition. I hope this compromise can benefit both parties.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: After contemplating your request, I find a reduction of 15% from our initial asking price to be below our acceptable range for this highly sought-after apartment in the city center. Consequently, I must decline your proposal. Nonetheless, I thank you for your interest and wish you the best in your search for suitable accommodation. TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
